entries.title: Bob Iger lays out his priorities for Disney as he returns as CEO
entries.description: Bob Iger was back at Disney headquarters on Monday to meet with employees for the first time since surprising the media world by returning as the company's CEO last week.

entries.title: 'Grave urgency': Over 400 business groups plead with Congress to prevent rail strike
entries.description: More than 400 business groups are calling on Congressional leaders to be prepared to prevent a freight rail strike that could start causing chaos in the economy as early as next week.

entries.title: Why going into work five days a week is a thing of the past
entries.description: We're never going back to the office -- at least not five days a week.

entries.title: A record $100 billion was paid out in life insurance benefits last year
entries.description: US life insurers paid out a record $100 billion in benefits in 2021, according to new data released Monday by the American Council of Life Insurers.

entries.title: Landslide on Italian island kills at least 8
entries.description: At least eight people have been confirmed dead after a landslide hit the Italian island of Ischia on Saturday, damaging buildings and obliterating transport infrastructure in its wake.

entries.title: Online Black Friday sales surge to new record
entries.description: Online Black Friday sales in the United States topped a record-breaking $9.12 billion this year, according to Adobe Analytics, kicking off a solid start to the holiday shopping season despite inflation and other economic concerns.
